background_description: The background consists of dark, blurry rock formations and possibly some muted coral or algae, displaying shades of deep blue, purple, and dark grey-brown, indicating an underwater rocky or reef environment.
explanation: The image clearly displays a Copperband Butterflyfish, identifiable by its distinctive yellow and white vertical stripes, long snout, and black ocellus spot. Its bright, contrasting coloration stands out sharply against the dark, muted background, confirming the absence of camouflage.
